thread.title: BRIEF-New Media Announces Qtrly Total Revenues Of $394.4 Million, An Increase Of 18.2%

title: BRIEF-New Media Announces Qtrly Total Revenues Of $394.4 Million, An Increase Of 18.2%
text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - New Media Investment Group Inc:
* NEW MEDIA ANNOUNCES STRONG FOURTH QUARTER & FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS, DIVIDEND OF $0.37 PER COMMON SHARE AND THE ANTICIPATED ACQUISITION OF THE EUGENE, OREGON REGISTER-GUARD FOR $14.25 MILLION
* NEW MEDIA INVESTMENT GROUP INC - QTRLY TOTAL REVENUES OF $394.4 MILLION, AN INCREASE OF 18.2% TO PRIOR YEAR ON A REPORTED BASIS
* NEW MEDIA INVESTMENT GROUP INC - QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.50‍​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
